attributes.action: Ensure Teachers teach the right stuff...
attributes.additional_details:
Ensure teachers offer you the support where required, not busy with other jobs; "Head of a department" as they are too busy to run revision.
Also ensure Teachers teach you the right learning to enable students to get the grades they aspire to. Some Schools do not teach the right things, meaning majority of students get E/U's in exams. Particuarly retakes. I revise VERY hard for exams, having been taught the wrong things meant i failed. I've never failed exams till now! Ofsted inspections should run randomly as many Schools go to extreme efforts to "glam" up. Some so desperate they even prepare lessons JUST for the inspection day. The amount of effort in preparing these lessonsSHOULDbe the amount of effort put into preparing our normal lessons!
Concerned atlack of support for University aspirations..attitudes & ethics mean I’m unable to achieve goals... Im condemed for wanting to study!
Please sign this, helping the future of Students unheard voices. Thank you!
